Memo 51
 A Smart Note-Taking App!

 How To Use?
 All the functionality provided in this app can be used by adding @ at the start.
 
 Setting Alarms :
 Dinner at Area 51
 @Alarm(18.30)

Will set an alarm at 18:30 with title "Dinner at Area 51"

This takes the title from a line above @Alarm usage.

Time provided is in HH.MM

Braces are must.


 Finding Total Cost :
 John owes-
 Jim @Rs(1500)
 Jerry @Rs(1200)
 Jack @Rs(750)

Will add a total at the end of the memo and display a toast.

This stores costs in an Integer as probable totals will be in Integer Range.

Braces are must.
